com.igeekinc.indelible.indeliblefs.bufcache

Interface BufferCache<I>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBufferCache, CollectionCache, FileBufferCache

    public interface BufferCache<I>

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void flush()
      Flushes all of the dirty buffers to the backing store
      void flushBuffer(Buffer bufferToFlush)
      Flushes the specified buffer to disk (normally called through the Buffer's flush() method.
      Buffer getBuffer(I id, int size)
      Returns the buffer containing the data at offset in the backing store of offset and size size.
      Buffer getBuffer(int size)
      Allocates space using the Allocator and returns a buffer for it if possible
